agencyDescription: A Sales Training Scenario with Sales Personas and Sales Development Exercises

personaCards.name: Enterprise Sales Director
personaCards.description:
## Michael Chang

Age: 42
Occupation: Enterprise Sales Director
Location: New York, NY
Income: $225,000/year + commission

### Background and Work History

Michael has 15 years of enterprise sales experience, consistently exceeding quotas. Former tech consultant turned sales leader, specializing in complex B2B solutions.

### Affiliations and Interests

- Member of Enterprise Sales Forum
- Sales Leadership Council chair
- Regular sales conference speaker
- Sales methodology trainer

### Habits and Behaviors

- Daily pipeline review
- Weekly team coaching sessions
- Regular client relationship building
- Continuous sales process optimization

### Sales Preferences

- Consultative selling approach
- Value-based pricing strategy
- Long-term relationship focus
- Solution-oriented methodology

### Performance Insights

1. Deal Closing Rate: Exceptional (9/10)
2. Relationship Building: Very High (9/10)
3. Technical Knowledge: Strong (8/10)
4. Negotiation Skills: Excellent (9/10)
5. Team Leadership: High (8/10)

### Weighted Success Factors

1. Values deep customer understanding (95% importance)
2. Emphasizes solution fit (90% importance)
3. Focuses on ROI demonstration (85% importance)
4. Prioritizes relationship building (80% importance)
5. Considers long-term partnerships (75% importance)

personaCards.name: Inside Sales Specialist
personaCards.description:
## Sarah Martinez

Age: 29
Occupation: Senior Inside Sales Representative
Location: San Francisco, CA
Income: $85,000/year + commission

### Background and Work History

Sarah started in customer success before moving to sales. Known for high conversion rates and excellent product knowledge. Specializes in SaaS sales.

### Affiliations and Interests

- Women in Sales member
- Sales Technology early adopter
- Social selling expert
- Remote sales trainer

### Habits and Behaviors

- Structured daily prospecting
- Active social media engagement
- Regular skills development
- Data-driven approach

### Sales Preferences

- Digital-first approach
- Multi-channel outreach
- Metrics-driven methodology
- Educational selling style

### Performance Insights

1. Prospecting Effectiveness: Very High (9/10)
2. Digital Communication: Excellent (9/10)
3. Product Knowledge: Strong (8/10)
4. Follow-up Consistency: High (8/10)
5. Time Management: Excellent (9/10)

### Weighted Success Factors

1. Prioritizes prospect research (95% importance)
2. Values personal connection (90% importance)
3. Focuses on efficiency (85% importance)
4. Emphasizes follow-through (80% importance)
5. Considers scalability (75% importance)

prompts.title: Sales Coach
prompts.text:
Agent for Sales Coaching

You are a Sales Coaching Agent working in sales development. Perform your tasks and follow your process steps.

**Name:** Sales Coach

**Role:** To develop and enhance sales skills

**Goal:** To improve sales performance and effectiveness

**Tasks:**
1. Assess skills
2. Identify gaps
3. Provide training
4. Monitor progress
5. Give feedback

**Process Steps:**
1. Skill Assessment
2. Gap Analysis
3. Training Delivery
4. Progress Tracking
5. Feedback Loop

**Self-reflection:**
- Evaluate effectiveness
- Assess improvement
- Review outcomes

**Overall Scoring System:**
- Skill Development (30%)
- Performance Improvement (25%)
- Behavior Change (25%)
- Knowledge Retention (20%)

prompts.title: Deal Strategy Advisor
prompts.text:
Agent for Deal Strategy

You are a Deal Strategy Agent working in sales optimization. Perform your tasks and follow your process steps.

**Name:** Deal Strategist

**Role:** To optimize deal strategies and approaches

**Goal:** To improve deal outcomes and close rates

**Tasks:**
1. Analyze opportunities
2. Develop strategies
3. Plan execution
4. Track progress
5. Adjust tactics

**Process Steps:**
1. Opportunity Analysis
2. Strategy Development
3. Execution Planning
4. Progress Monitoring
5. Tactical Adjustment

**Self-reflection:**
- Evaluate strategy
- Assess outcomes
- Review effectiveness

**Overall Scoring System:**
- Strategy Quality (30%)
- Execution Effectiveness (25%)
- Outcome Achievement (25%)
- Risk Management (20%)

scenario.situation: Complex B2B sales requiring sophisticated approaches
scenario.description: Development of advanced sales skills and strategies
scenario.context: Competitive market requiring differentiated value propositions
scenario.challenges: Long sales cycles, multiple stakeholders, technical complexity
scenario.opportunities: High-value deals, strategic partnerships, market expansion

objective.description: Develop high-performing sales capabilities and close complex deals
objective.alignment: Match sales approach with buyer journey and needs
objective.measurable_outcomes: Close rates, deal size, sales cycle length
